title: Chile plans to open embassy in occupied Palestinian territories
description: Chilean President Gabriel Boric says move aims to give Palestinians representation and respect under international law.

title: Photos: In Madrid, a ‘toy hospital’ marks its last Christmas
description: Antonio Rivas took over the workshop from his father in the 1970s and watched as interest in traditional toys fell.

title: China’s COVID rebellion

title: Russia dismisses US decision to send Patriot missiles to Ukraine
description: Russia's Vladimir Putin slams US move to send Patriot missiles to Ukraine, saying move won't help resolve conflict.

title: US governor to remove makeshift border wall criticised as ‘stunt’
description: Arizona Governor Doug Ducey has reached an agreement to remove shipping containers stacked as a wall from federal lands.

title: What does future hold for Afghan women after university ban?
description: Women in Afghanistan express shock and anger over Taliban decision that drew international condemnation.

title: FTX founder Bankman-Fried released on $250m bond
description: Bail package requires Bankman-Fried surrender his passport and remain in confinement at his parents' home in Palo Alto.

title: Low weekly jobs claims underscores tight labour market
description: New data shows a still-tight labour market while Q3 economy rebounded to 3.2 percent, revised up from 2.9 percent.

description: Bill requiring the US tax enforcement agency to audit presidents' tax filings faces uphill battle to become law.

title: US warns Taliban of ‘costs’ over university ban for Afghan women

title: Sweden still has requirements to meet to join NATO: Turkey
description: Stockholm is not even halfway through fulfilling the commitments it made to secure Ankara's support, Turkey says.

title: Armed groups in northern Mali pull out of Algiers peace talks
description: The groups negotiating with the military government demand talks in a neutral country under international mediation.

title: What is the post-FTX future of cryptocurrency?
description: Cryptocurrencies, experts say, have mainly been speculative, which only worked as long as real dollars were there.

description: French serial killer Charles Sobhraj expected to return to France but will not leave prison until Friday, lawyer says.

description: The war is poised to escalate as Russia has planned new conscription and Ukraine’s allies have lifted weapons bans.

description: Kremlin spokesman criticises Zelenskyy's visit to US and military support for Kyiv, says Russia's war goals will be met.

title: Jordan’s truckers struggle to get by, sparking protests, violence

title: Armenia: Russia’s peacekeepers failed mission in Nagorno-Karabakh
description: Yerevan says the troops are not fulfilling an obligation to control the Lachin corridor that it says is being blockaded.

title: Al-Shabab kills two policemen, one civilian in eastern Kenya

title: Sysmex says Japan approves blood test kit for Alzheimer’s marker
description: Kit measures accumulation of protein that marks disease - a rare advance in tackling a condition that affects millions.

title: Fiji’s military called in to maintain order after disputed polls

description: Ivory Coast is the world’s top cocoa-producing country but receives just 4% of the $100bn chocolate industry's profits.

title: UN Security Council resolution demands end to Myanmar violence

description: Religious Zionism is a growing force in Israel, and will have a strong presence in the next Israeli government.
